attributes.action: Bring the cost of Petrol and Diesel under £1 per litre
attributes.additional_details:
E-Petition to bring the cost of Petrol and Diesel under £1 a litre.

At present the curret price of diesel as of today 31/05/2012 is £1.41 and petrol £1.33.
This is too expensive and greedy of the UK Government.

Even if you do not own a vehicle the price of fuel will still impact your cost of living.
Fuel price affects the price of food, clothes and anything else you may find in a shop.

Please sign this today
